participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and sociable, loves to share about food and interests.
participant_1.background: i only eat kosher. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i'm a stunt double as my second job.

participant_2.name: Sophie

participant_2.background: i do not drink soda. i like to take walks. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries. i've a boyfriend. i live in a house.

content.text: I like to eat hamburgers and French fries
